title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; chat, generate, embeddings with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; simple wrapper for chat and completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks for Ollama + Open-WebUI + NVIDIA runtime.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot integrating Ollama for private and channel-based LLM chats.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and chatters.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers as part of CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with chat, completions, and embeddings; NuGet package.

title: ollama-r
summary: R wrapper for Ollama REST API; install via devtools::install_github().
